text: إِلَّا رَحۡمَةٗ مِّن رَّبِّكَۚ إِنَّ فَضۡلَهُۥ كَانَ عَلَيۡكَ كَبِيرٗا

translation.en: Except [We have left it with you] as a mercy from your Lord. Indeed, His favor upon you has ever been great
translation.id: kecuali karena rahmat dari Tuhanmu. Sungguh, karunia-Nya atasmu (Muhammad) sangat besar
